attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Acle strait is one of the most dangerous stretches of road in the UK,
(A47) There are numerous fatal accidents every year along this stretch as it is still only single lane, and has been this way ever since it was built for stage coaches centuries ago! OK, it is tarmac now, but it should have been dualed ages ago to stop overtake collisions.
The situation is further ridiculous, because central government will not release funding for this urgent work, yet it costs the public purse £1m per fatality and with the number of regular fatalities on this road, it could have been paid for already several times over!
STOP THE CARNAGE IN NORFOLK!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Dual the Acle Strait now!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15118.asp

Prime Minister's Office
